---
title: Alpha-Linolenic Acid (ALA)
subtitle: Omega-3 Fatty Acid
---



# Synthesis

ALA cannot be synthesized in humans, but rather is obtained through diet


# Function

ALA is used to create other &omega;-3 fatty acids, including [eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA)]({{< var ref-eicosapentaenoic-acid.path >}}) and [docosahexaenoic acid (DHA)]({{< var ref-docosahexaenoic-acid.path >}})
